9-to-5ers

Wanna be a person who is Crushing the day with a perfect combo of work, self-discovery, and zero burnout vibes Select one track!!!

Pomodoro Technique

Work in short, focused intervals (e.g., 25 minutes) followed by a short break to maintain productivity and prevent burnout..

Eisenhower Matrix

Prioritizes tasks into four categories: urgent and important, important but not urgent, urgent but not important, and neither urgent nor important.

Batch Processing

Group similar tasks and complete them together, such as responding to emails or making phone calls.
